short.ar: حاجب إعلانات يوتيوب الوحيد المضمّن في AdBlock، أكثر الامتدادات شهرة في Chrome مع ما يزيد على ٦٠ مليون مستخدم حول العالم
short.am,bn,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_4: The only YouTube™ ad blocker built by AdBlock, the most popular Chrome extension with 60 million users worldwide
short.bg: Единственият блокер за YouTube™, създаден от AdBlock — най-популярното разширение за Chrome с над 60 милиона потребители в цял свят!
short.ca: L'únic bloquejador d'anuncis de YouTube™ creat per AdBlock, l'extensió de Chrome més popular amb 60 milions d'usuaris a tot el món
short.de: Der einzige YouTube™ Ad-Blocker – von AdBlock, der beliebtesten Chrome-Erweiterung mit 60 Millionen Nutzern weltweit
short.es: El único bloqueador de anuncios de YouTube™ por AdBlock, la extensión más popular de Chrome con más de 60 millones de usuarios
short.fr: Le seul bloqueur de pub sur YouTube™ par AdBlock, l’extension Chrome la plus populaire avec 60 millions d’utilisateurs dans le monde
short.he: חוסם פרסומות YouTube™ היחיד שנבנה ע״י AdBlock, הרחבת Chrome הפופולרית ביותר עם 60 מיליון משתמשים ברחבי העולם
short.hu: Az egyetlen YouTube™ hirdetésblokkoló az AdBlock jóvoltából, a legnépszerűbb Chrome bővítmény 60 millió felhasználóval világszerte
short.it: L'unico ad-blocker per YouTube™ creato da AdBlock, l'estensione più famosa di Chrome, con oltre 60 milioni di utenti nel mondo
short.ja: 世界で合計6千万人のユーザーが使う一番人気のChrome拡張機能のAdBlockにより開発されたYouTube™用の広告ブロッカー
short.ko: 6천만 사용자가 선택한 Chrome 확장 프로그램 1위, AdBlock의 YouTube™ 광고 차단기
short.ms: Satu-satunya penyekat iklan YouTube™ dibina oleh AdBlock, sambungan Chrome paling popular dengan 60 juta pengguna seluruh dunia
short.nl: De enige YouTube™-advertentieblokker gebouwd door AdBlock, de populairste Chrome-extensie met 60 miljoen gebruikers wereldwijd
short.no: Den eneste YouTube™-reklameblokkereren laget av AdBlock, den mest populære Chrome-utvidelsen med 60 millioner brukere verden over
short.pl: Tylko AdBlock blokuje reklamy w YouTube™, najpopularniejsze rozszerzenie Chrome z 60 milionów użytkowników z całego świata
short.pt_BR: O único bloqueador de anúncios do YouTube™ construído por AdBlock, a extensão do Chrome com 60 milhões de usuários no mundo todo
short.ru: AdBlock, Самое популярное расширение для Chrome, которым пользуется уже 60 миллионов человек, представляет: единственный…
short.sv: Den enda annonsblockeraren för YouTube™, byggd av AdBlock, det mest populära Chrome-tillägget med 60 miljoner användare över hela…
short.tr: Dünya üzerinde 60 milyon kullanıcısı olan Chrome eklentisi AdBlock tarafından yapılan tek YouTube reklam engelleyici
short.uk: Блокувальник реклами для YouTube™ на базі AdBlock, найпопулярнішого розширення Chrome із 60 мільйонами користувачів по всьому світу
short.zh_CN: AdBlock 提供的唯一能够拦截 YouTube™ 广告的应用，最受欢迎的 Chrome 扩展，拥有超过 6000 万用户
short.zh_TW: 由 AdBlock 打造的唯一一個 YouTube™ 廣告攔截程式，最受歡迎的 Chrome 擴充功能，全球擁有超過六千萬使用者

long.ar,bg,ca,cs,de,es,fr,hu,it,ja,ko,ms,nl,n: Created by AdBlock, with 60M users, AdBlock on YouTube is the gold standard of blockers for YouTube.
long.am,bn,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,:
AdBlock on YouTube™ removes ads and enhances your video watching experience.

You don't have to sit through unskippable pre-roll ads with AdBlock. Unlike other ad blockers, AdBlock lets you filter ads and even allow ads on individual channels to support the YouTubers you love. 

-------------------------------------------------------
Why is AdBlock on YouTube the best ad blocker?

☞ AdBlock on YouTube is a free ad blocker app based on the same open source code that powers AdBlock, one of the best adblockers worldwide with more than 350 million downloads.
☞ Easy setup makes it simple to install, and you can disable the adblocker at any time.
☞ Get rid of annoying pre-roll, mid-roll, and other video ads that interrupt what you are trying to watch.
☞ Don’t let your videos get interrupted by intrusive ads. Block them before they even pop up with the best video ad blocker protection.
Want to stop all video ads in a matter of seconds? Download AdBlock on YouTube, and visit the AdBlock website here for more info: https://getadblock.com/
long.he:
AdBlock on YouTube

Remove ads with the only YouTube™ adblocker built by AdBlock, the most popular Chrome adblock extension with 60 million users worldwide.
 
You don't have to sit through unskippable pre-roll ads with AdBlock, plus (unlike other YouTube-only ad blockers), AdBlock on YouTube lets you filter ads and allow ads on individual YouTube channels to support the YouTubers you love. 

-------------------------------------------------------
Why is AdBlock on YouTube the best ad blocker?

☞ AdBlock on YouTube is a free ad blocker app based on the same open source code that powers AdBlock, one of the best adblockers worldwide with more than 250 million downloads.
☞ Easy setup makes it simple to install AdBlock on YouTube, and you can disable the adblocker at any time.
☞ Get rid of ads like banners, popups, flash ads, media ads, video ads, and more, protecting yourself from harmful malware and scams.
☞ Don’t let your YouTube video get interrupted by an annoying ad, block it before it even pops up with the best ad blocker for Chrome.
☞ Unlike Adblock Plus, uBlock Origin, and other popular ad blockers, AdBlock on YouTube is built with one goal in mind: to stop ads and stop pop ups on YouTube.

Want to stop all ads in a matter of seconds? Download AdBlock on YouTube, and visit the AdBlock website here for more info: https://getadblock.com/

-------------------------------------------------------
YouTube is a registered trademark of Google, Inc.
